text: Aur hum ney madiyan ki taraf unn kay bhai shoaib (alh-e-salam) ko bheja. Unhon ney farmaya aey meri qom! Tum Allah ki ibadat kero iss kay siwa koi tumhara mabood nahi tumharay pass tumharay perwerdigar ki taraf say wazeh daleel aa chuki hai. Pus tum naap aur tol poora poora kiya kero aur logon ko unn ki cheezen kum kerkay mat do aur ruy-e-zamin mein iss kay baad kay iss ki durusti ker di gaee fasaad mat phelao yeh tumharay liye naafay hai agar tum tasdeeq kero
